localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
blogPost.body: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
blogPost.title: Makeena - Making better products affordable no matter where you shop.
blogPost.author: Karen Frame

localize.description: Makeena奖励购买“更好”的消费者，同时为品牌提供实时的购物者洞察力。我们的应用程序捕获所有收据数据，以及其他活动，而我们的仪表板则允许品牌访问这些数据，以推动重复购买行为。
localize.tagline: 无论你在哪里购物，都能买得起更好的产品。

localize.description: Makeena獎勵購買“更好”的消費者，同時爲品牌提供實時的購物者洞察力。我們的應用程序捕獲所有收據數據，以及其他活動，而我們的儀表板則允許品牌訪問這些數據，以推動重複購買行爲。
localize.tagline: 無論你在哪裏購物，都能買得起更好的產品。

previous.excerpt: Snazzy AI is the fastest, highest quality, GPT-3 powered app on the market. Through a combination of best in class tech from OpenAI and our own ML layer you can quickly create any type of content you can image. And even better, we have a forever free plan.
previous.title: Snazzy AI - AI-powered content creation. Free for everyone.

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市场上速度最快、质量最高、由GPT-3驱动的应用。通过结合OpenAI的一流技术和我们自己的ML层，你可以快速创建任何类型的内容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我们有一个永远免费的计划。
localize.tagline: AI驱动的内容创作。人人免费。

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市場上速度最快、質量最高、由GPT-3驅動的應用。通過結合OpenAI的一流技術和我們自己的ML層，你可以快速創建任何類型的內容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我們有一個永遠免費的計劃。
localize.tagline: AI驅動的內容創作。人人免費。

next.excerpt: Synced with calendar, MeetingRule displays the real-time availability of any space and lets you book it directly from the device. This helps start any meeting on time, finish it in time, eliminate unnecessary meetings, and boost the corporate productivity.
next.title: MeetingRule - Office space bookings simplified. It just syncs.

localize.description: 与日历同步，MeetingRule显示任何空间的实时可用性，让你直接从设备上预订。这有助于准时开始任何会议，及时完成会议，消除不必要的会议，提高企业生产力。
localize.tagline: 办公空间预订简化。就是同步。

localize.description: 與日曆同步，MeetingRule顯示任何空間的實時可用性，讓你直接從設備上預訂。這有助於準時開始任何會議，及時完成會議，消除不必要的會議，提高企業生產力。
localize.tagline: 辦公空間預訂簡化。就是同步。
